options.name: Tough
options.description: Gain +1 skill with endurance. Also, you ignore the first time you would become winded during combat.

options.name: Slugger
options.description: Once per round, on any Action or Reaction, when you make a melee attack, you can also make a brawling attack. The round resets at the start of your turn.

options.name: Engager
options.description: You are usually first to join the fray. Gain +1 skill with coordination. On the first turn of combat, your free movement speed during your turn is doubled.

options.name: Vitality
options.description: You are naturally more hardy than others. Gain +3 health.

options.name: Action : Body Blow
options.description: You make a brawling attack at a creature that is your size or smaller. If the attack hits, the target must make an endurance check against half the damage dealt after mitigation or become winded.

options.name: Action : Power Pummel
options.description: You make a vicious attack with either a brawling or melee weapon that has the blunt property. If at least 3 dice hit, the target becomes dazed. If 3 dice are all 8 or higher, the target becomes stunned.

options.name: Body Block
options.description: You have become effective at blocking attacks by using your body. Gain +1 skill with deflection.

options.name: Heavy Hitter
options.description: Gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.

options.name: Action : Curbstomp
options.description: You target a creature that is prone and making a devastating attack at them, using your might as your attack roll against a contested evasion or deflection check. For each dice that hit, deal 4 damage plus the physical mitigation value on your boots. Minions and grunts have a penalty dice while defending against this attack and are executed if any of the dice hit.
